about_the_game: Gather your squad of up to five diverse and dynamic skeletons, each wielding unique abilities, as you venture forth on an epic action-adventure to vanquish menacing creatures, acquire new skills, and grow stronger in a world shrouded in darkness.
detailed_description: Gather your squad of up to five diverse and dynamic skeletons, each wielding unique abilities, as you venture forth on an epic action-adventure to vanquish menacing creatures, acquire new skills, and grow stronger in a world shrouded in darkness.
name: Skeleton Attack: Nightmare Awaken

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6006, 2.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700, 3.60 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB

short_description: Unleash the power of the resilient skeletons as you embark on a perilous journey to defeat creatures, acquire new skeletons, and become stronger in this captivating action-adventure.
